LanguageData.XMonsters_TerriblyShotRange.label: terribly shot range
LanguageData.XMonsters_TerriblyShotRange.description: For some reason, carriers of this gene cannot shoot further than their noses.
LanguageData.XMonsters_VeryShortShotRange.label: very short shot range
LanguageData.XMonsters_VeryShortShotRange.description: Carriers of this gene somehow have a very short shooting range.
LanguageData.XMonsters_ShortShotRange.label: short shot range
LanguageData.XMonsters_ShortShotRange.description: Carriers of this gene somehow have a short shooting range.
LanguageData.XMonsters_LongShotRange.label: long shot range
LanguageData.XMonsters_LongShotRange.description: Carriers of this gene somehow have a long shooting range.
LanguageData.XMonsters_VeryLongShotRange.label: very long shot range
LanguageData.XMonsters_VeryLongShotRange.description: Carriers of this gene somehow have a very long shooting range.
LanguageData.XMonsters_UnrealLongShotRange.label: unreal long shot range
LanguageData.XMonsters_UnrealLongShotRange.descriptio: HOW DOES HE MANAGE TO SHOOT SO FAR?!
